topic.title: Scheduler
topic.section:
The Conference Manager can use Scheduler to make arrangements of times and locations regarding conference presentations and any other events: first define buildings and rooms as well as time blocks, and then drag and drop items under unscheduled presentations and unscheduled events into appropriate time block, and designate a building and room for each of them.

For presentations, once they have gone through editorial process and been accepted, they will appear under Unscheduled Presentations.

For events, once they are created by clicking on Special Events under Rooms & Events, they will appear under Unscheduled Events.
